verses.verse: וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> vi-ho-Shu-a' Now Joshua זָקֵ֔ן <WH2204> za-Ken, was old בָּ֖א <WH935> ba [and] stricken בַּיָּמִ֑ים <WH3117> bai-ya-Mim; in years וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, about אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You זָקַ֙נְתָּה֙ <WH2204> za-Kan-tah unto him Thou art old בָּ֣אתָ <WH935> Ba-ta [and] stricken בַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> vai-ya-Mim, in years וְהָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> ve-ha-'A-retz land נִשְׁאֲרָ֥ה <WH7604> nish-'a-Rah and there remaineth הַרְבֵּֽה־ <WH7235> har-beh- much מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> me-'Od yet very לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> le-rish-Tah. to be possessed

זֹ֥את <WH2063> zot likewise הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz This [is] the land הַנִּשְׁאָ֑רֶת <WH7604> han-nish-'A-ret; that yet remaineth כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all גְּלִיל֥וֹת <WH1552> ge-li-Lot all the borders הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> hap-pe-lish-Tim of the Philistines וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הַגְּשׁוּרִֽי׃ <WH1651> hag-ge-shu-Ri. and all Geshuri

מִֽן־ <WH4480> min- from הַשִּׁיח֞וֹר <WH7883> hash-shi-Chor From Sihor אֲשֶׁ֣ר׀ <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei which [is] before מִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, Egypt וְעַ֨ד <WH5704> ve-'Ad far גְּב֤וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul even unto the borders עֶקְרוֹן֙ <WH6138> 'ek-rOn of Ekron צָפ֔וֹנָה <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah, northward לַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <WH3669> lak-ke-na-'a-Ni to the Canaanite תֵּחָשֵׁ֑ב <WH2803> te-cha-Shev; [which] is counted חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת׀ <WH2568> cha-Me-shet five סַרְנֵ֣י <WH5633> sar-Nei lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines הָעַזָּתִ֤י <WH5841> ha-'az-za-Ti the Gazathites וְהָאַשְׁדּוֹדִי֙ <WH796> ve-ha-'ash-do-Di and the Ashdothites הָאֶשְׁקְלוֹנִ֣י <WH832> ha-'esh-ke-lo-Ni the Eshkalonites הַגִּתִּ֔י <WH1663> hag-git-Ti, the Gittites וְהָעֶקְרוֹנִ֖י <WH6139> ve-ha-'ek-ro-Ni and the Ekronites וְהָעַוִּֽים׃ <WH5757> ve-ha-'av-Vim. Avims

מִתֵּימָ֞ן <WH8486> mit-tei-Man From the south כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz all the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֗י <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni, of the Canaanites וּמְעָרָ֛ה <WH4632> u-me-'a-Rah and Mearah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that לַצִּידֹנִ֖ים <WH6722> latz-tzi-do-Nim that [is] beside the Sidonians עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far אֲפֵ֑קָה <WH663> 'a-Fe-kah; unto Aphek עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad far גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul to the borders הָאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri. of the Amorites

וְהָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ve-ha-'A-retz And the land הַגִּבְלִ֗י <WH1382> hag-giv-Li, of the Giblites וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הַלְּבָנוֹן֙ <WH3844> hal-le-va-nOn and all Lebanon מִזְרַ֣ח <WH4217> miz-Rach east side הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> hash-She-mesh, east side מִבַּ֣עַל mib-Ba-'al גָּ֔ד <WH1171> Gad, from Baalgad תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat below הַר־ <WH2022> har- under mount חֶרְמ֑וֹן <WH2768> cher-Mon; Hermon עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad far לְב֥וֹא <WH935> le-Vo unto the entering חֲמָֽת׃ <WH2574> cha-Mat. into Hamath

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei All the inhabitants הָ֠הָר <WH2022> Ha-hor of the hill country מִֽן־ <WH4480> min- from הַלְּבָנ֞וֹן <WH3844> hal-le-va-Non from Lebanon עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far מִשְׂרְפֹ֥ת mis-re-Fot מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4956> ma-yim unto Misrephothmaim כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all צִ֣ידֹנִ֔ים <WH6722> tzi-do-Nim, [and] all the Sidonians אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I אוֹרִישֵׁ֔ם <WH3423> o-ri-Shem, them will I drive out מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei from before בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel רַ֠ק <WH7535> rak but הַפִּלֶ֤הָ <WH5307> hap-pi-Le-ha only divide thou it by lot לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> le-Yis-ra-'El unto the Israelites בְּֽנַחֲלָ֔ה <WH5159> be-na-cha-Lah, for an inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher I צִוִּיתִֽיךָ׃ <WH6680> tziv-vi-Ti-cha. as I have commanded

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah, Now חַלֵּ֞ק <WH2505> chal-Lek Now therefore divide אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֧רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz this land הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> haz-Zot for בְּנַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> be-na-cha-Lah for an inheritance לְתִשְׁעַ֣ת <WH8672> le-tish-'At unto the nine הַשְּׁבָטִ֑ים <WH7626> hash-she-va-Tim; tribes וַחֲצִ֖י <WH2677> va-cha-Tzi and the half הַשֵּׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> hash-She-vet tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <WH4519> Ham-nash-Sheh. of Manasseh

עִמּ֗וֹ <WH5973> im-Mo, the other הָרֽאוּבֵנִי֙ <WH7206> ha-r-'u-ve-Ni With whom the Reubenites וְהַגָּדִ֔י <WH1425> ve-hag-ga-Di, and the Gadites לָקְח֖וּ <WH3947> la-ke-Chu have received נַחֲלָתָ֑ם <WH5159> na-cha-la-Tam; their inheritance אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> na-Tan gave לָהֶ֜ם la-Hem מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, which Moses בְּעֵ֤בֶר <WH5676> be-'E-ver them beyond הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <WH3383> hai-yar-Den Jordan מִזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> miz-Ra-chah, eastward כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> ka-'a-Sher which נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> na-Tan gave לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh [even] as Moses עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> 'E-ved the servant יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

מֵעֲרוֹעֵ֡ר <WH6177> me-'a-ro-'Er From Aroer אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is on שְׂפַת־ <WH8193> se-fat- that [is] upon the bank נַ֨חַל <WH5158> Na-chal of the river אַרְנ֜וֹן <WH769> ar-Non Arnon וְהָעִ֨יר <WH5892> ve-ha-'Ir and the city אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בְּתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> be-toch- that [is] in the midst הַנַּ֛חַל <WH5158> han-Na-chal of the river וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הַמִּישֹׁ֥ר <WH4334> ham-mi-Shor and all the plain מֵידְבָ֖א <WH4311> meid-Va of Medeba עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far דִּיבֽוֹן׃ <WH1769> di-Von. unto Dibon

וְכֹ֗ל <WH3605> ve-Chol, and all עָרֵי֙ <WH5892> 'a-Rei And all the cities סִיחוֹן֙ <WH5511> si-chOn of Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> ma-Lach which reigned בְּחֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <WH2809> be-chesh-Bon; in Heshbon עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far גְּב֖וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul unto the border בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> am-Mon. of Ammon

וְהַגִּלְעָ֞ד <WH1568> ve-hag-gil-'Ad And Gilead וּגְב֧וּל <WH1366> u-ge-Vul and the border הַגְּשׁוּרִ֣י <WH1651> hag-ge-shu-Ri of the Geshurites וְהַמַּעֲכָתִ֗י <WH4602> ve-ham-ma-'a-cha-Ti, and Maachathites וְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> ve-Chol and all הַ֥ר <WH2022> har and all mount חֶרְמ֛וֹן <WH2768> cher-Mon Hermon וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הַבָּשָׁ֖ן <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan and all Bashan עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far סַלְכָֽה׃ <WH5548> sal-Chah. unto Salcah

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all מַמְלְכ֥וּת <WH4468> mam-le-Chut All the kingdom עוֹג֙ <WH5747> 'Og of Og בַּבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> bab-ba-Shan, in Bashan אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who מָלַ֥ךְ <WH4427> ma-Lach which reigned בְּעַשְׁתָּר֖וֹת <WH6252> be-'ash-ta-Rot in Ashtaroth וּבְאֶדְרֶ֑עִי <WH154> u-ve-'ed-Re-'i; and in Edrei ה֤וּא <WH1931> hu he נִשְׁאַר֙ <WH7604> nish-'Ar who remained מִיֶּ֣תֶר <WH3499> mi-Ye-ter of the remnant הָרְפָאִ֔ים <WH7497> ha-re-fa-'Im, of the giants וַיַּכֵּ֥ם <WH5221> vai-yak-Kem smite מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh for these did Moses וַיֹּרִשֵֽׁם׃ <WH3423> vai-yo-ri-Shem. and cast them out

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo did not הוֹרִ֙ישׁוּ֙ <WH3423> ho-Ri-shu expelled בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei Nevertheless the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַגְּשׁוּרִ֖י <WH1651> hag-ge-shu-Ri not the Geshurites וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַמַּעֲכָתִ֑י <WH4602> ham-ma-'a-cha-Ti; nor the Maachathites וַיֵּ֨שֶׁב <WH3427> vai-Ye-shev dwell גְּשׁ֤וּר <WH1650> ge-Shur but the Geshurites וּמַֽעֲכָת֙ <WH4601> u-ma-'a-Chat and the Maachathites בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> be-Ke-rev among יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, the Israelites עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad until הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom until this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. this

רַ֚ק <WH7535> rak but לְשֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> le-She-vet Only unto the tribe הַלֵּוִ֔י <WH3878> hal-le-Vi, of Levi לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo did not נָתַ֖ן <WH5414> na-Tan he gave נַחֲלָ֑ה <WH5159> na-cha-Lah; none inheritance אִשֵּׁ֨י <WH801> 'ish-Shei made by fire יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu he נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <WH5159> na-cha-la-To, [are] their inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher he דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> dib-ber- as he said לֽוֹ׃ lo. ס sa-Mek

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten gave מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, And Moses לְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh unto the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children רְאוּבֵ֖ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven of Reuben לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam. [inheritance] according to their families

וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> vay-Hi become לָהֶ֜ם <WH1992> la-Hem like הַגְּב֗וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul, And their coast מֵעֲרוֹעֵ֡ר <WH6177> me-'a-ro-'Er was from Aroer אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is on שְׂפַת־ <WH8193> se-fat- that [is] on the bank נַ֨חַל <WH5158> Na-chal of the river אַרְנ֜וֹן <WH769> ar-Non Arnon וְהָעִ֨יר <WH5892> ve-ha-'Ir and the city אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בְּתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> be-toch- that [is] in the midst הַנַּ֛חַל <WH5158> han-Na-chal of the river וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הַמִּישֹׁ֖ר <WH4334> ham-mi-Shor and all the plain עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- by מֵידְבָֽא׃ <WH4311> mei-de-Va. by Medeba

חֶשְׁבּ֥וֹן <WH2809> chesh-Bon Heshbon וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all עָרֶ֖יהָ <WH5892> 'a-Rei-ha and all her cities אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בַּמִּישֹׁ֑ר <WH4334> bam-mi-Shor; that [are] in the plain דִּיבוֹן֙ <WH1769> di-Von Dibon וּבָמ֣וֹת u-va-Mot בַּ֔עַל <WH1120> Ba-'al, and Bamothbaal וּבֵ֖ית u-Veit בַּ֥עַל Ba-'al מְעֽוֹן׃ <WH1010> me-'on. and Bethbaalmeon
וְיַ֥הְצָה <WH3096> ve-Yah-tzah And Jahazah וּקְדֵמֹ֖ת <WH6932> u-ke-de-Mot and Kedemoth וּמֵפָֽעַת׃ <WH4158> u-me-Fa-'at. and Mephaath

וְקִרְיָתַ֣יִם <WH7156> ve-kir-ya-Ta-yim And Kirjathaim וְשִׂבְמָ֔ה <WH7643> ve-siv-Mah, and Sibmah וְצֶ֥רֶת ve-Tze-ret הַשַּׁ֖חַר <WH6890> hash-Sha-char and Zarethshahar בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> be-Har in the mount הָעֵֽמֶק׃ <WH6010> ha-'E-mek. of the valley

וּבֵ֥ית u-Veit פְּע֛וֹר <WH1047> pe-'or And Bethpeor וְאַשְׁדּ֥וֹת <WH794> ve-'ash-Dot and the slopes הַפִּסְגָּ֖ה <WH6449> hap-pis-Gah of Pisgah וּבֵ֥ית u-Veit הַיְשִׁמֽוֹת׃ <WH1020> hay-shi-Mot. and Bethjeshimoth
